text: Aey woh logon jinhein kitab di gayi thi! Maan lo us kitab ko jo humne ab nazil ki hai aur jo us kitab ki tasdeeq o taeed karti hai jo tumhare paas pehle se maujood thi. Ispar iman le aao qabl iske ke hum chere bigaad kar pichey pher dein ya unko usi tarah laanat zadah kardein jis tarah sabt (Sabbath) walon ke saath humne kiya tha, aur yaad rakkho ke Allah ka hukum nafiz hokar rehta hai
